name: crackers, ham, and cheese
description:
I love creating little sandwich towers. ham cheese ham. cheese cheese cheese. cracker.

Sorry if this comes across your explore page and you expected something well done and good. Instead, you're found my non-sponsored lunchables simulator I made as a joke. 

The cover of this is a screenshot from this a very normal article about football. I kind of just yoinked it but it was the reason I made this, so I might as well

There's only a downloadable version because for some reason it breaks if I try to make it a web game. not sure what I did but Unity becomes very unhappy if I try to change it

V1 is very simple. you have crackers. you have ham. you have cheese. you have a reset button. now go and make sandwiches. There's literally nothing else. 

V2 introduces a main menu and two more modes of sandwich-making. Go ham. Or maybe beef. Or perhaps, even pepperoni.

V3 allows you to screenshot your creations and share them in case you want everyone to see your "amazing" sandwiches. The file will show up in the folder you have the game in. (It's V3.1 because I forgot to change some values in the code)
